snippet: The two states with the largest influence on the primary process fail to reflect the demographics of the United States.
abstract: The two states with the largest influence on the primary process fail to reflect the demographics of the United States.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -While traveling around Iowa and New Hampshire, I've been surrounded by white people. With few exceptions, the only non-whites I've encountered have been journalists who've parachuted into these states to cover the Republican campaigns.

headline.main: View of the World From New Hampshire and Iowa
